[console_scripts]
darfix = darfix.main:main

[ewoks.tasks.class]
darfix.tasks.* = darfix

[orange.canvas.help]
html-index = orangecontrib.darfix.widgets:WIDGET_HELP_PATH

[orange.widgets]
darfix = orangecontrib.darfix.widgets

[orange.widgets.tutorials]
darfix = orangecontrib.darfix.tutorials

[orange3.addon]
darfix-add-on = orangecontrib.darfix
